9th IEEE RADIO International Conference

27 October 2025 – 30 October 2025

Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers IEEE Flic en Flac, Mauritius

Welcome to IEEE RADIO 2025!

The 9th edition of IEEE RADIO will be held from 27th to 30th October 2025 in Flic-en-Flac, Mauritius. The aim of the conference is to discuss recent developments, theories and practical applications covering the whole scope of radio frequency engineering, including radio waves, antennas, propagation and electromagnetic compatibility.

Prospective authors are invited to submit original contributions on their latest research activities. Student papers are strongly encouraged. IEEE RADIO 2025 will feature three Best Student Paper Awards, a Young Scientist Award and an Industrial Engineering Paper Award. Proposals for special sessions, workshops and tutorials are welcome. A panel of distinguished researchers will deliver keynote speeches/invited talks on recent technology trends and advances.

IEEE Radio 2025 topics

Topics for this conference include:

  • Antenna theory
  • Wave propagation and scattering
  • Electromagnetic compatibility
  • Analytical and numerical methods
  • Smart antennas and arrays
  • RF components and systems
  • Wireless communication systems
  • Biological effects
  • Radio astronomy
  • Wireless power transfer
  • Devices and circuits
  • Nanotechnology
  • Remote sensing
  • High-power devices and techniques
  • Instrumentation and measurement techniques
  • Medical and industrial applications of electromagnetic fields
  • Modeling, simulation, computer aided design
  • Electronic packaging and integration
  • Metamaterials and other novel materials

Impact Orbit Creative Group

Impact Orbit Creative Group is a multi-disciplinary consultancy and innovation hub focused on driving sustainable growth, digital transformation, and impact-led strategies in the space and technology sectors. We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to deliver strategic guidance, communications expertise, and frameworks for responsible innovation.
